root_authorized_keys.description: SSH public authorized key(s) for the root user

root_ssh_rsa.description: private SSH rsa key for root user

root_ssh_rsa_pub.description: public SSH rsa key for root user (mostly not required)

syslog_host.description: syslog server IP address and port seperated by colon

mail_auth_user.description: smtp username if authentication is required

mail_adminaddr.description: admin email address alias for all mails to root@localhost

ssh_host_rsa_key.description: private SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_rsa_key.pub.description: public SSH rsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.description: private SSH dsa key for the host daemon

ssh_host_dsa_key.pub.description: public SSH dsa key for the host daemon

munin_master_allow.description: ip addresses (alternative hostname) of the munin master node
